nodes.text: Stasis vault 113 was a Rakatan vault in the the Tomb, an ancient prison on the planet Belsavis. Located in the Ancient Stasis Zone of the Tomb, the stasis vault was damaged during the invasion of Belsavis and the creatures it contained unleashed into the Tomb. Doctor Larek of the Galactic Republic sent several droids into the vault to recover memory cores from Rakata security droids, but when the droids failed to return, he recruited Republic personnel in the area to do so.
Stasis vault 113 appears as a location on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and is the site of the Republic mission "Unheard Frequencies."
